sentences.sContent: a large organization with offices throughout the world
sentences.sCn: 在世界各地都设有办事处的一家大型机构

sentences.sContent: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
sentences.sCn: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.sContent: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
sentences.sCn: 这幢房子状况极好，全部铺着地毯。

trans.tranOther: in every part of a particular area, place etc
